name: Experimental Gameplay #8 - Exploration
description:
This game consists of an experimental prototype for a short game.

Goal: Find the artifact (Hint: it's very big).

Controls:

* WASD to move.

* Space to jump.

* Right click to grapple to a surface.

* Shift to retract the grapple, Control to expand the grapple.

* Press Escape to quit the game.

This game was made for a class at the University of Utah known as "Experimental Gameplay", which challenges students to make short games with unique mechanics using a gamejam-like format. For this game I decided to explore creating an environment to navigate.
